reviewTimeLines.summary: FAB-1277 Employer leave plan listview/FAB-1294

comments.author: Trevor Higgins
comments.comment:
Using "EMPLOYER_LEAVE_PLAN_EDIT_NOT_ALLOWED" as the variable name is too restrictive here. If you look in EditLeavePlanController, it has a string CANNOT_EDIT_TOOLTIP, which has a different message. You should rename this to remove the EMPLOYER prefix, as there is nothing to do with EMPLOYER in the message.
Similarly, where this constant is used (EmployerLeavePlansListviewWidget) has isEditable() method, which checks the secured action and the BO itself. Again, there is almost identical logic in EditLeavePlanController. This logic should be moved to a service and called from both places i.e. there should be only one place to check editability for the leave plan. See http://jira/browse/FAB-1193. You have now added this logic to another place, IMO you should do this refactor rather.

comments.author: Brian Cowzer
comments.comment: fixed message and updated http://jira/browse/FAB-1193 in info on refactoring required
